name: Pawport
0:
”Alexa, open the pet door.”
”Alexa, change the color of the pet door to ‘teal’.”
”Alexa, lock the pet door.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Introducing "Pawport" — your furry friend's gateway to a world of convenience! This magical Alexa skill transforms your pet door into a high-tech wonderland, putting you in control with just a few voice commands.

Imagine this: from the comfort of your couch, you can now open and close the pet door for your curious critter, ensuring they can explore the backyard on a whim. Need to set the mood? "Pawport" lets you change the light color inside, creating the perfect ambiance for playtime or relaxation.

But wait, there's more! Worried about security? With "Pawport," you can lock or unlock the pet door with a simple voice prompt, keeping your home safe and your pet secure. And when the sun sets or rises, effortlessly turn the lights on or off, ensuring your pet feels right at home.

"Pawport" isn't just a skill — it's your companion in simplifying pet care and enhancing your home's environment. Say goodbye to unnecessary trips across the room and hello to the future of pet door management, all at your command. So go ahead, unlock the potential of your pet's world with "Pawport" today!
